synopsis.text:
Tutu is a heartwarming and magical tale of a clumsy yet lovable duck named Ahiru, who is transformed into a human girl by the enigmatic author, Drosselmeyer. Ahiru's newfound humanity comes with a purpose: she must use her magical egg-shaped pendant to transform into the elegant and talented ballet dancer, Princess Tutu. As Princess Tutu, Ahiru's mesmerizing dances have the power to heal the emotional turmoil of those around her.

Ahiru's ultimate mission is to collect the scattered shards of her prince's heart, which he shattered to seal away an evil raven for eternity. As Ahiru navigates the whimsical town filled with talking cats and crocodiles, she must help her prince regain his heart and emotions, all while defying the tragic fate written by Drosselmeyer.

This captivating anime explores the struggles of its heroes as they challenge their destinies, with their beliefs, feelings, and actions determining whether this fairy tale will reach its happily ever after. The story unfolds in two parts, with the first part comprising 13 episodes of 25 minutes each, and the second part consisting of 24 episodes of 12 minutes each, culminating in a 25-minute finale. Will Ahiru's love and determination be enough to change the course of this tragic tale and lead to a joyful ending? Join Ahiru on her enchanting journey to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
